item.title: Light out - told it was fixed but not, 6th August
item.description:
Reference 7967796 Told that problem fixed but light still out. Please advise if this has been sent on to another agency. I noticed a Conway lorry outside yesterday so presumed it was fixed, but light still out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, St. Audrey Avenue, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Yet more fly tipping, 6th August

item.title: Youths on illegal electric bikes, 6th August
item.description:
It has become an all to apparent problem with youths riding electric bikes along the footpaths at speeds exceeding 40mph. These types of bikes are illegal (250kw/15.5mph is the maximum allowed legal rating). It is only a matter of time before someone is seriously injured or worse. I myself was subject to a near miss and a victim of abusive language while walking along the path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Rochester Way, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed car, 6th August
item.description:
Car been dumped on chilver Street parking bay with no tax ran out 1.5.2025 no mot ran out 3.1.2025 been parked for over 1 month in residents parking bay please remove asap as now as flat tyre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chilver Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 temporary signs re traffic lights left on pavement, 6th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Derwent Drive, Poverest, London

item.title: Bin has lost its top and is overflowing, 6th August
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned fridge. The second one in two weeks., 6th August
item.description:
The Scope charity donation bin has been an issue now for a long time. It is located next to Bermondsey Arts Club - 102A Tower Bridge Road SE1 4TP. People leave rubbish outside the bin constantly. I have notified Scope of this issue but they don’t respond.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grigg's Place, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Double yellow lines worn out, 6th August
item.description:
Basically people are now parking on either side of Lensbury way particularly at the start of the road as the double yellow lines have worn out. This could present a problem for emergency services trying to access the residents property. Also due to the yellow lines being worn out on the bend it has turned the corner into a blind corner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lensbury Way, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
